an10.222:1: "Bhikkhus, possessing twenty qualities, one is deposited in hell as if brought there. What twenty? () One destroys life oneself and (2) encourages others to destroy life … (9) one holds wrong view oneself and (20) encourages others in wrong view. Possessing these twenty qualities, one is deposited in hell as if brought there.
an10.222:2: "Possessing twenty qualities, one is deposited in heaven as if brought there. What twenty? (1) One abstains from the destruction of life oneself and () encourages others to abstain from the destruction of life …… (19) one holds right view oneself and (0) encourages others in right view. Possessing these twenty qualities, one is deposited in heaven as if brought there."
